sections.content:
Question:
What kind of H/W safety feature s in RA0E1 ?
Answer:
The  RA0E1 has a number of safety functions that allow confirmation of normal operation.
1. Error detection
Independent Watchdog timer (IWDT)
Flash memory CRC calculation
SRAM parity error detection
2. Memory protection
Illegal memory access
Flash area protection
Register write protection
3. Fault detection
Frequency detection
A/D self-check test
GPIO readback level detection
Customers can use these functions to easily perform self-diagnostics on microcontrollers. 
Suitable Products
RA0E1
